members.name: Sanjib Kumar
members.description: A senior industry professional and the visionary behind SKAPL. With over 30 years of experience, including his tenure as General Manager at Essar Steel India Ltd, Sanjib has led large-scale industrial projects, greenfield implementations, and energy transformations.
members.impact: Under his guidance as an IIM-B Independent director, Swami Solar grew into a trusted solar partner across Gujarat, serving residential, commercial, and industrial sectors. As founder of SKAPL, Sanjib now brings this same spirit of excellence into a broader horizon — offering clients renewable solutions, industrial consulting, and digital energy transformation.
members.quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination. We turn sustainable dreams into reality.

members.name: Vishrut Kumar
members.description: IIIT-B Product management student and a  dynamic young leader with a flair for AI, data analytics, and product success. Previously interned with VerSe Innovation (Dailyhunt) where he built internal analytics tools and optimized model pipelines for AI performance.
members.impact: Solely made BurnStop, a B2B AI SAAS cloud monitoring tool with integrations to optimize cloud costs saving thousands of dollars which goes towards unused cloud services
members.quote: A feature is not a product; A product is more than features, it's an emotion
